requirement.title: Velocity Measurements
requirement.description: The velocity shall be measured by the NAVS every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$.

requirement.title: Barometer measurement
requirement.description: The NAVS shall read the altimeter every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Lidar measurements
requirement.description: The NAVS shall read the LIDAR every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Nav data transmission
requirement.description: The NAVS shall transmit the following data \begin{itemize} \item Velocity \item Barometric altitude \item LIDAR \end{itemize} every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.
